analysis.key_quote: I oppose this proposed rule in its entirety, and every section of the proposed rule, as it allows for the reintroduction of a "spoils" system to the federal civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about politicization, due process rights, and the integrity of the merit-based civil service system. It emphasizes the risks of political manipulation and the erosion of employee protections, aligning with strong opposition to the rule.
